name: Violent Gust
description: When casting a Wind Spell, push your target back 1 space. If that space is occupied, the target is not pushed back and takes damage equal to ½ your Mag - the target’s Def. Cutting Gale Variant: The target is moved back 2 additional spaces. If the target happens to collide with another foe or an object with HP, they both take the same damage from the impact.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
